reviews.review_msg: Not helpful whatsoever. Had a quiz about names of places and geography tht was worth 20%. It was random choice of anything in the world, incuding names of rivers. Avoid this teacher.

His first time teaching, and it was horrible. He doesn't use a mic, his voice puts me to sleep. Essays on the midterm & final are brutal. Your mark is made of the midterm, final, a map quiz (that is held 4 times a sem, but if you get below 15/20, your mark is cut in half), and a paper. His midterm was out of 25, and is EXTREMELY easy to fail.

Hes new just graded sum 09 dont bother buying the textbook I got an A didnt even read anything just memorize his lecture notes ALL of them he asks everything the notes are fill in the blanks its the essay thats horrid and the marking the eassy most people got 60/100(not cl av.) most students recieved this i never got below 80 on a paper n i got 69
